headline: Will Surging Backlog and Organic Growth Shift Johnson Controls' (JCI) Investment Narrative?
summary: Johnson Controls International recently reported better-than-expected third quarter results, with 2.6% organic topline growth and a substantial 11% increase in its systems and services backlog to US$14.6 billion. This operational strength has bolstered investor confidence, with analysts responding positively to the surge in backlog and organic growth despite ongoing market pressures. We’ll review how the strong expansion in the company’s systems and services backlog factors into its...
